Product Title: A Company Man
Review Date: 2017/01/19
Store: Ji-seob So  (Actor),     Mi-yeon Lee  (Actor),     Sang-yoon Lim  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Product Description', "Hyeong-do (SO Ji-sub) goes to the office every day, but isn't thrilled with the cubicles, the politics, his co-workers, or the management. His job is murder. Literally. At this company, death is all in a day's work. Hyeong-do is a corporate assassin, working for a company specializing in contract killings. He's one of the best, and a loyal employee. But when his new trainee gets killed on the job, he feels an obligation to care for the kid's family and taking his eye off the ball is not how a guy gets promoted. Now, Hyeong-do wants out of the cutthroat rat race to start a new life, but his colleagues have different plans - and retirement may come at a far bloodier price than expected.", 'Review', '"Slick and effective" --Controlled Burning"A blackly satirical comedy" --Film Business Asia']
Average Rating: 4.6

reference_summary:
Supernatural: Season 11 [DVD]
Jared Padalecki  (Actor),     Jensen Ackles  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Television
['Supernatural: The Complete Eleventh Season (DVD)', "The thrilling and terrifying journey of the Winchester brothers continues as SUPERNATURAL enters its 11th season. In the show's tenth season, the Winchesters faced their most personal threat yet. The all-powerful Mark of Cain threatened to consume Dean, turning him into one of the monsters he has spent his life hunting. Meanwhile, a formidable witch, Rowena, rose to power to claim her position at the right hand of the King of Hell, Crowley (Mark A. Sheppard). Once Rowena revealed herself to be Crowley's mother, the King was forced to choose between his family and the Winchesters - all while Sam, with the help of fallen angel Castiel (Misha Collins), Crowley, and some unlikely allies, wages a desperate battle to save Dean from the Mark of Cain. Will Sam be able to find a cure for the Mark in time? Will it be enough to save his brother? And a more frightening prospect ... does Dean even want to be saved?", ']]>']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: The user maintains a strong preference for supernatural themes, horror, and drama genres in television series, while also expanding into action and thriller genres, especially those featuring dark comedy elements. 
- **Content Type**: Enjoys boxed sets and comprehensive collections for a complete viewing experience, with an additional interest in individual movies that align with their genre preferences.
- **Format Preference**: Prefers DVDs for home viewing, appreciating high-quality audio, subtitle options, and tends to opt for multiple formats to enhance the viewing experience.
- **Engagement**: Actively engages with content from favorite actors and creators, demonstrating brand loyalty, particularly towards esteemed actors and filmmakers within the genres they favor.
- **Rating Behavior**: Tends to rate highly, reflecting satisfaction with media purchases. Recently they rated a movie with a perfect score, indicating a consistent positive engagement with the content they consume.

Overall, the user exhibits a focused interest in supernatural horror dramas and character-driven storytelling, while also exploring action-thrillers that incorporate dark humor. They value complete series collections and high-quality presentations, as well as enjoying isolated films with engaging narratives, showcasing a consistently enthusiastic engagement with beloved actors and creators.
